publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4520 Kenneth Gibson: Beith Cancer Support Group—That the Parliament congratulates Beith Cancer Support Group on raising over £26,000 this year to help local cancer patients; praises the group for raising over £309,000 for cancer research in its 20-year existence; commends the altruism and care shown by all involved in the support group under the leadership of Bill and Moira Haining; compliments the group on its innovative fundraising such as coffee mornings, whist drives and supper dances, and takes inspiration from its ever increasing drive to help local cancer patients.
